title: brother sold my old account
body:
so im 16 years old and began playing league of legends when I was very young I even remember getting ufo corki and stuff like that but things happened in my life which led to me not playing as much league and my brother sold my account with my parent's permission but not mine now years later im thinking if there is something i could do about this or if it's just day dreaming. I doubt there is anything I can do but I do remember the year it got sold in 2011 and I also remember the old summoner name "--snip--" now that has been changed and I have since made another account with that set name so i don't even know if it could be found but i would love it if it could and i could get my old account back because i had some really cool things on that account 
---snip--

replies.body: This sounds like a really unfortunate case, and I'm not sure what we can do but we can try!  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account team can investigate this.  Account selling is not something we support, but we'll take a delicate look at your specific case to see what can be done.  I've also removed account info on your post for privacy reasons.  We'll get back to you!
